Articles.Content: It bugs me that with every update, the patcher just goes wonky on me. I keep having to download the full game, and now I have several versions of the full game cluttering my files. Are there any plans to fix the patcher?
What exactly is going wrong with your patcher?

Steam transfer is a great option. You get automatic instant updates as soon as they're published and you avoid massive server loads. I was playing 0.21 about a minute and a half after the new website came online. Otherwise, I think there is a plan to upgrade the proprietary update system.

when i try to run my patcher i get an error saying that it is not a valid Win32 Application.

i cant use steam because it sucks it hates my slow internet
yes, but not everyone has acess to steam/can transfer the game to steam.
I have Steam. How do I transfer?

when i try to run my patcher i get an error saying that it is not a valid Win32 Application.

i cant use steam because it sucks it hates my slow internet

Have you tried right click and running as admin ?
